content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone processing setup at position(x=-50.0, y=0.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x=-50.0, y=0.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=-54.0, y=0.0)
- Wooden chest (position x=-51.5, y=0.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=-51.5, y=-0.5)

### Expanded stone processing setup at position(x=-50.0, y=2.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x=-50.0, y=0.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=-47.0, y=2.0)
- Wooden chest (position x=-49.5, y=2.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=-48.5, y=2.5)
- Assembling machine (position x=-41.5, y=2.5)
- Additional burner inserter (position x=-45.5, y=2.5)
- Output chest (position x=-39.5, y=2.5)

### Production facility at position(x=20.0, y=20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x=-46.0, y=21.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=23.0, y=20.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=21.5, y=20.5)
- Assembling machine 2 (position x=26.5, y=20.5)
- Assembler inserter (position x=24.5, y=20.5)
- Output chest (position x=28.5, y=20.5)
- Small electric pole (position x=26.5, y=18.5)

### Partial power plant at position(x=24.5, y=17.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler (position x=24.5, y=17.0)
- Small electric pole network (positions x=26.5,y=18.5 and x=28.5,y=18.5)

### Stone collection point at position(x=-45.5, y=22.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest (position x=-45.5, y=22.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=-44.5, y=22.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement validation errors (continued)
- Verify terrain is completely clear before attempting to place entities (multiple failures on water tiles)
- Check for existing entities in target placement area before attempting placement (failed boiler placement at occupied position)
- Use proper spacing between entities (especially 2x2 and 3x3 buildings)
- For power plants, verify water source availability before placing offshore pumps
- Implement position scanning logic to find nearest valid placement location

### Entity interaction errors (new)
- Verify entity existence before attempting interactions (failed burner mining drill lookup at x=21.0,y=20.0)
- Check entity attributes before accessing them (furnace.drop_position missing)
- Ensure proper entity type checking before attempting connections (transport belt to furnace)
- Handle missing entity cases gracefully with fallback logic

### Inventory management errors
- Check inventory contents before attempting to place items
- Verify required materials are available before construction attempts
- Check target inventory capacity before inserting items (boiler fuel insertion failed due to full inventory)

### Production chain issues
- Ensure all intermediate products are available before attempting complex crafts
- Verify power supply before attempting electric operations
- Handle missing resource cases gracefully with fallback logic

### Recipe configuration issues
- Verify building supports recipe setting before attempting
- Check recipe requirements are met before configuration
- Handle cases where recipe cannot be set due to missing ingredients

### Power system problems (new)
- Ensure proper electrical connections for all powered entities
- Verify boiler has water input before operation
- Check power network connectivity for assembling machines
